item.title: 'Devastated': Two people killed in glider crash near Taupō
item.description:

item.title: Gang crackdown: Police seize $250m in real estate assets
item.description:
Police have seized $250 million in real estate assets from suspected criminals in just five years.
The property seizure crackdown is targeted at organised crime and stripping gangs of luxury homes as ...
